sentences.cn: “杰斯给我做了这张卡。”“真不错！”
“愿上帝保佑你，伊娃，”他低声说。

sentences.en: Bless my heart ! We are in a fix.
sentences.cn: 天呀! 我们真是进退两难.

sentences.en: During his visit, the Pope will also bless the new hospital.
sentences.cn: 在访问期间，教皇还将为新医院祈福。

sentences.en: God bless and thank you all so much.
sentences.cn: 愿上帝保佑你们，非常感谢。

sentences.en: He’s always willing to help. Bless him!
sentences.cn: 他一向乐于助人，愿上帝保佑他！

sentences.en: I'll bless you for this the longest day I live. "
May God bless you with a long life!
Mr. Darnay , good - night , God bless you, sir!
O my dear, my dear, will you bless me as fervently to - morrow?'
sentences.cn: 啊,我亲爱的, 亲爱的, 你明天也愿这样热烈地为我祝福 么 ? ”

sentences.en: She kisses his lips; he kisses hers; they solemnly bless each other.
sentences.cn: 她吻吻他的嘴唇, 他也吻吻她的嘴唇, 两人彼此郑重地祝福.

sentences.en: The couple later had their marriage blessed in their local parish church.
sentences.cn: 那对夫妇后来在他们当地教区的教堂里领受了婚姻祝福。

sentences.en: The people went up to the bridegroom and the bride to bless them.
sentences.cn: 人们走向前去向新郎新娘祝福.

sentences.en: Why, bless you he's in Sheol these five years! "
sentences.cn: 嘿, 不瞒您说,他五年前就进了鬼门关了. ”

words.tran_cn: 幸福的；受祝福的；神圣的
使幸福（bless的ing形式）；使神圣化；为…祈神赐福
祝福；保佑（bless的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 长命百岁！（对打喷嚏者说的话）

phrases.phrase: not have a penny to bless oneself with

trans.tran_cn: 祈求上帝保佑，祝圣，赞美上帝
trans.tran_en: if God blesses someone or something, he helps and protects them
used to show that you are fond of someone, amused by them, or pleased by something they have done
